summary: DT:  THE CONTACT OWNS A 1997 CHEVROLET SUBURBAN.  SHE RECEIVED  RECALL 05V379000  NOTICE FOR A 2001 CHEVROLET SILVERADO REGARDING THE ABS SYSTEM.   THE CONTACT  STATED THAT THE 1997 CHEVROLET SUBURBAN IS EXPERIENCED  THE SAME  ABS BRAKE PROBLEM AS  INDICATED IN  THE RECALL.  WHEN THE BRAKES WERE APPLIED IT SEEMED AS IF THE ABS SYSTEM WAS KICKING IN, AND THERE WAS  EXTENDED  STOPPING DISTANCE.  IT DID  NOT MATTER WHAT THE ROAD CONDITIONS WERE THIS WOULD  HAPPEN EVEN ON DRY ROADS.  THE SERVICE DEALER DID STATED THAT THE SENSOR IN THE VEHICLE NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  THE MANUFACTURER HAS NOT BEEN CONTACTED.*AK
